CustomField.formula: CASE( Disposition__c , "Not Eligible", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif", "red", 30, 30), "Course Closed", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif", "red", 30, 30), "Invalid", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif", "red", 30, 30), "No Response", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0155j000002LLoY", "orange", 30, 30), "Cold", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0155j000002LLoY", "orange", 30, 30), "Filled Application with Other Credentials", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0155j000002LLoZ", "royal blue", 30, 30), "Not Interested", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file= 0155j000002LLoY", "orange", 30, 30), "Hot",IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "yellow", 30, 30), "Warm",IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "yellow", 30, 30), "Enrolled",IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif", "green", 30, 30), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0155j000002LLoa", "white", 30, 30))
CustomField.label: Visual Status
